update t_pec_capital_pricing
f_version = #{version,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_capital_no = #{capitalNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_capital_code = #{capitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_pricing_no = #{pricingNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_current_mirror_no = #{currentMirrorNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_match_type = #{matchType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
f_match_target_no = #{matchTargetNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_repayment_formula_no = #{repaymentFormulaNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_repayment_formula_name = #{repaymentFormulaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_year_rate = #{yearRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_month_rate = #{monthRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_day_rate = #{dayRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
f_clearing_formula_no = #{clearingFormulaNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_clearing_formula_name = #{clearingFormulaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_profit_distribution_no = #{profitDistributionNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_profit_distribution_name = #{profitDistributionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_remain_capital_code = #{remainCapitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_remain_capital_name = #{remainCapitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_remain_capital_member_no = #{remainCapitalMemberNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_compensatory_capital_code = #{compensatoryCapitalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_compensatory_capital_name = #{compensatoryCapitalName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
f_compensatory_member_no = #{compensatoryMemberNo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_compensatory_expand_info = #{compensatoryExpandInfo,jdbcType=CHAR},
f_created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
f_modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where f_id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.insert:
insert into t_pec_capital_pricing (f_capital_no, f_capital_code, f_pricing_no, f_current_mirror_no, f_match_type, f_match_target_no, f_repayment_formula_no, f_repayment_formula_name, f_year_rate, f_month_rate, f_day_rate, f_clearing_formula_no, f_clearing_formula_name, f_remain_capital_code, f_remain_capital_name, f_remain_capital_member_no, f_compensatory_capital_code, f_compensatory_capital_name, f_compensatory_member_no, f_compensatory_expand_info) values
(#{item.capitalNo}, #{item.capitalCode}, #{item.pricingNo}, #{item.currentMirrorNo}, #{item.matchType}, #{item.matchTargetNo}, #{item.repaymentFormulaNo}, #{item.repaymentFormulaName}, #{item.yearRate}, #{item.monthRate}, #{item.dayRate}, #{item.clearingFormulaNo}, #{item.clearingFormulaName}, #{item.remainCapitalCode}, #{item.remainCapitalName}, #{item.remainCapitalMemberNo}, #{item.compensatoryCapitalCode}, #{item.compensatoryCapitalName}, #{item.compensatoryMemberNo}, #{item.compensatoryExpandInfo})
